name: 吳忠敏
objective:
本課程的重點在於闡述應用統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含資料蒐集與描述、機率論、抽樣方法與抽樣分配、假設檢定、變異數分析、迴歸與相關分析。
The purpose of this course is to give students an introductory of statistical thinking, methods development and the assessment of credibility and value of inferences made from data. A conceptual introduction to the field of statistics and its many applications with extensive coverage of data collection and analysis as needed to evaluate the reported results of statistical students and make a good decision will be included as well. The purpose of Statistics and its application is to give an introduction of descriptive statistics, probability, and inductive statistics. They include data collection and description, probability, sampling methods and sampling distribution, hypothesis testing, ANOVA, regression and correlation analysis. The statistical software introduction will also be introduced in the class.
